title: alecfisker
author: alecfisker
content: Are you unsure if your product: - is ready to be released?- does it have any unrecognized hidden problems?- does it work with all the browsers and devices you want?If so, then you can rely on us. The goal of QA testing is to provide your end consumers with an outstanding and bug-free experience, which is essential for the development of your product.Our QA team will work with you to make sure your product is prepared for users!We will test for the following during the testing session: functionality, usability, compatibility, and performance.Depending on the package you select, you'll get bug descriptions with examples, images with annotations, and videos of the problems.We are a quality assurance team that is certified and has five-star reviews. We have a solid background in the corporate IT sector.In order to ensure maximum compatibility, your product will be personally tested on a number of genuine devices for various Operating systems and Browsers.Order right away to assure the quality of your goods, but if you're unsure whether our services would work for you, please get in touch with us first.

comments.author: alecfisker
comments.body: Continued, skills listUNIX/ Shell scripting basicsCI/ CD pipelines using tools such as JenkinResilience testingKnowledge of performance testing tools such as Gatling and JMeterUnderstanding of containers, Kubernetes, DockerKnow how to use Splunk and other query monitoring toolsGood grasp of cloud services such as MS Azure and AWS
